name: Kenju
summary:
A 3D fighting game developed by DreamFactory that was slated to hit arcades in 2005 but was subsequently cancelled before launch, even though it had arcade location tests in Japan near the end of 2004 and in january 2005.
It resurfaced years later and got a homebrew port for the Sega Dreamcast in 2021 alongside many other games for the Atomiswave.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: KenJu - Unreleased Atomiswave game now on Dreamcast!
